title: Alan Leong: Civic Party welcomes united front with China

replies.msg:
In the interview with the Civic Party leader Alan Leong in Ming Pao, Leong disclosed that many key members of his party, including himself, have been the subjects of Chinese united front strategy before and after the party established.

“Civic Party embraces communication since established. We welcomes united front with Chinese Communist Party for the good of Hong Kong under one condition, we can keep our own thinking,” said Leong.
